casebody.data:
Bruce D. TAYLOR, Employee
v.
HOWARD TRANSPORTATION, INC., Employer
Travelers Indemnity Company of America, Carrier. No. 191P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Neil P. Andrews, Charlotte, for Howard Transportation, Inc., et al. M. Duane Jones, Charlotte. W. Phillip Moseley, Burlington, for Taylor, Bruce D. M. Duane Jones, Charlotte, for Howard Transportation, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of June 2015 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
